name: <vec::Vec<T, A> as vec::spec_extend::SpecExtend<T, vec::into_iter::IntoIter<T>>>::spec_extend

vec::Vec::<T, A>::append_elements.doc: Appends elements to `self` from other buffer.

vec::into_iter::IntoIter::<T, A>::forget.doc: Forgets to Drop the remaining elements while still allowing the backing allocation to be freed.
